otherNames: 武逆, Wu Ni, Martial Inverse, Turn the Tide
synopsis: Feng Hao, the eldest young master of the Feng family, has an extraordinary background but is unable to cultivate, and is cast aside as waste by everyone. Accidentally, he found that there was a little loli master living in his body, and there were as many top-level exercises as the secrets! What waste materials can’t be cultivated, and what waste materials get out of the family, Feng Hao used his skyrocketing strength to prove that he is the god of Tianwu Continent
